SEARCH

Class StaffAccount

java.lang.Object
UserAccount
StaffAccount
public class StaffAccount extends UserAccount
StaffAccount is a subclass of UserAccount that stores StaffAccount objects. It contains methods to create camps, process suggestions, and edit camps.
Since:
2023-11-24
Version:
1.0

      public void createCamp(String campName, Date startDate, Date endDate, Date regDeadLine, String userGroup, String location, int totalSlots, int campCommSlots, String description, boolean visibility, CampStorage campStorage)
      For the staff to create a camp
      Parameters:
      campName - The camp name.
      startDate - The start date of the camp.
      endDate - The end date of the camp.
      regDeadLine - The registration deadline of the camp.
      userGroup - The user group of the camp.
      location - The location of the camp.
      totalSlots - The total slots of the camp.
      campCommSlots - The camp committee slots of the camp.
      description - The description of the camp.
      visibility - The visibility of the camp.
      campStorage - The camp storage.

      Parameters:
      tarSuggestion - The suggestion to be processed.
      studentStorage - The student storage.
      approval - The choice of the staff(accept or reject).
